chunk:
InstaNatural Rose Makeup Cleansing Balm

Brand: InstaNatural

Category: Makeup Remover

Ingredients: Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride*, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Glyceryl Stearate SE*, Sorbitan Oleate Decylglucoside Crosspolymer*, Polyglyceryl-10 Dipalmitate*, Silica, Aqua, Rose Extract, Honey, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam)

s Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Hesperidin, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Hibiscus Rosa-Sinensis Flower Extract, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Glycerin*, Sodium Chloride*, Tocopherol*, Glyceryl Caprylate*, Glyceryl Unde

late*, Glyceryl Undecylenate*.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
